origin.windborne.icarae.name: Icarae
origin.windborne.icarae.description: Carnivorous bird people, Icarae fly low to the ground, weaving between and through obstacles to hunt their prey.
power.windborne.icarae/wings.name: Feathered
power.windborne.icarae/wings.description:
Icarae are born with white feathered wings, and are quicker in the air than all others and capable of propelling themselves upward.

However, this exhausts a lot of hunger, and they can't fly when low on energy.
power.windborne.icarae/hollow_boned.name: Hollow Boned
power.windborne.icarae/hollow_boned.desc: Icarae evolved hollow bones for speed and efficiency, but this has left them more vulnerable to damage.
